EmailTemplate.name: DataArchiva : Setup Failed
EmailTemplate.subject: DataArchiva Object Seetup Failed
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear **name**,
This is a system generated mail from Salesforce DataArchiva application. The object you were trying to configure got failed and details are given below. Please rectify the issue and re-configure it. In case if you're unable to figure out the root cause and require help, please contact support@dataarchiva.com with this mail attached.
Organization ID : **OrgId**
Object Name : **object**
Date : **Date and time**
Failure cause : **Message**
Thanks, DataArchiva System
